main.info: Find out more about the sole proprietorship, the history of its origins and the company's goals.
main.text2-2: mobility by Skoda Enyaq iV 80 since 2020
main.title: Taxi-Varga

entry0.text: A trip between Vienna and Vienna International Airport with plenty of space for your luggage.
entry0.title: Airport - Vienna

entry1.text: A trip within, from or to Lower Austria with the option of a stay on site.
entry1.title: Destination - Lower Austria

entry2.text: A day trip to a golf course of your choice with the option of being accompanied as a caddy or fellow player.
entry2.title: Golf day trip

entry3.text: Instead of a fixed destination, a trip can also be taken by a time flatrate.
entry3.title: Flatrate

entry4.text: Check the package price and (depending on availability) order spontaneously by phone (no pre-order).
entry4.title: Spontaneous drive

sub.entry0:
Daily business hours: 04:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.
(off-time on request)
sub.entry2: Elevated seat positions for senior friendly entrance/exit
sub.entry3:
Transportation:
4 people max with luggage
3 people max with golf equipment
2 people max with luggage and golf equipment
sub.entry4: Flat rates may vary depending on traffic data
sub.title: What makes the service?
